list.item: 2023–ongoing. Eduard Hanslick, Schriften für die “Neue Freie Presse,” 1864–1904, ed. by Alexander Wilfing in collaboration with Katharina Bamer, Anna-Maria Pfiel, and Daniel Elsner. Open access edition, including TEI markup (31 items as of June 13, 2022). https://hanslick.acdh.oeaw.ac.at/toc.html.
